description: Kobe Bryant, the 37-year-old Los Angeles Lakers basketball star, said on Sunday that he will end his career after this season.
title: Kobe Bryant Announces Retirement
title_page: Kobe Bryant Announces Retirement - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Kobe Bryant, the 37-year-old Los Angeles Lakers basketball star, said on Sunday that he will end his career after this season.
